$.fn.observe=function(options,callback){var self=this;self.getValue=function(){var val=[];self.nodes.each(function(){val.push($(this).val());});return val.join('|');};self.start=function(){self.stop();self.lastTrigger=self.lastChange=new Date();self.interval=window.setInterval(self.intervalCheck,self.options.checkDelay);self.lastValue=self.getValue();self.changed=false;};self.stop=function(){window.clearTimeout(self.timeout);window.clearInterval(self.interval);};self.intervalCheck=function(){if(self.nodes.parents('body').length==0){self.stop();return;} trigger=false;switch(self.options.type){case'once':if(now-self.lastChange>self.options.delay){trigger=true;} break;case'constant':if(now-self.lastTrigger>self.options.delay){trigger=true;} break;default:throw new Error('jQuery.observe: "'+self.options.type+'" is not a valid observer type');break;} if(!trigger){return;} self.lastTrigger=new
